bibl.title: Territory of Washington V. Sterling P. White. Criminal
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

div1.p:
TERRITORY OF WASHINGTON,
County of Spokane } SS.

Territory of Washington
Plaintiff
vs.
S.P. White
Defendant }
In the District Court of the Territory of Washington and for the First Fourth Judicial District thereof, holding terms at Cheney, Spokane County, in said Territory
To the Sheriff of Lincoln County, Greeting:

IN THE NAME OF THE UNITED STATES, You are hereby commanded to summon Alfred Stookey to be and appear before the District Court aforesaid at the Court House, in Cheney, in said County, on the forthwith day of A.D. 1885, at o'clock, M. to there give evidence in the above entitiled cause on the part of said Defendant S.P. White
Witness the Hon. George Turner Associate Judge of the Supreme Court of Washington Territory, and Judge of said Court, and the Seal thereof affixed, this 17 day of April A.D. 1885

Kate W. Feuerbach Clerk.
By R. Strobach Deputy.
TERRITORY OF WASHINGTON, County of Spokane Lincoln } SS.
I hereby certify that I served the within I served Subpoena on the within named witness by reading the same to them in said Cheney County, on this day of April A.D. 1885

John Cody Sheriff
By JN Friedlander Deputy.
In the District Court of the Territory of Washington, and for the First Judicial District thereof, holding Terms at Cheney, Spokane County, in said Territory
Returned and Filed this 28 day of, April A.D. 1885

Kate W. Feuerbach Clerk.
By. R. Strobach Deputy.
Serving 1 names at 40 40 Mileage 48 miles at 10 480 Total, ---$ 420 5.20
